Previous Next Welcome to Wayback Machine! Archive Web Pages and Tweets to the Wayback Machine. Save From Anywhere "When you're using your Android phone or tablet and find an interesting article, blog post, or webpage. You can save it to Wayback Machine so you can return to it later. Just look for the Share button, which can be found in your device's menu, or when tapping the Share menu from any apps. Here's what some common Share buttons looks like on Android:" "Once you've found the Share menu, tap "Wayback Machine", and a link will be saved to Wayback Machine." Share the Archived URL Follow these simple steps to share the archived URL with your friends. 1. Tap the Share button 2. Tap any app you want to share, and then tap Share button
Please send bug reports, questions and suggestions to info@archive.org Version:
